content: Phase 2: Generate design guidelines (shadcn/ui) for Acenta Master (Agentis+ clone)
Phase 2: Backend - implement JWT auth + org/user/role model + serialization helpers
Phase 2: Backend - implement core CRUD: customers, products, rate plans, inventory
Phase 2: Backend - implement reservations workflow (reserve/confirm/cancel), voucher HTML endpoint, manual payments
Phase 2: Backend - implement CRM leads + quotes + convert-to-reservation
Phase 2: Backend - implement B2B (agencies, agents, discount/commission groups) + agent booking
Phase 2: Backend - implement reports (sales summary, reservations summary, CSV export)
Phase 2: Frontend - implement app shell (login, layout, nav, role-based routing)
Phase 2: Frontend - implement Reservations + Voucher print view + Payments UI
Phase 2: Frontend - implement CRM (customers, leads board, quotes builder)
Phase 2: Frontend - implement B2B portal (agent login, booking)
Phase 2: End-to-End Testing using Testing Agent (all user stories)
Phase 2: Update plan.md with implementation status and next steps
